divs: sighting detailsi looked off my back deck and saw what looked like a cigar tube, "hanging" in the sky. it was vertical. the sun was glinting off of it's metallic (like chrome" surface. it caught my eye in that, it just hung there about 1 mile or so away to the west. it was not moving at all. i've never seen anything in the sky like that. i had a very clear view of it and i have better than 20\20 vision. there were a lot of fast moving clouds, so i only saw it breifly. i have no doubts that it wasn't anything man made. as the clouds kept rolling by it must have dissappeared. also, on july 4th, i came home from work and my wife told me that she saw something. she said she saw a row of about 5 white lights moving west in the skies over our condo. as they passed, the lights turned red. she said they were slow moving and made no sound. the gradually got higher and higher moving west towards carver. i was at work at the time and got home at midnight. she told me about her encounter and that she felt creepy and couldn't sleep. she normally retires at 8:30-9pm.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around July 13th 2006
